Class IslandListManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.scene.gamecomponents.IslandListManager
public class IslandListManager extends Object

      onMnClick - Handler a click on mother nature
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null

  • Method Details

    • startManaging

      public void startManaging()
      Start reactively managing the layout.

      Note: the absence of a stopManaging() here is intentional. The lifecycle of each GameState object is as long as that of its view. Therefore, we have to worry only about internal cleanup between relayouts.

    • layout

      private void layout(javafx.collections.ObservableList<? extends IslandGroup> list)
      Cleans the slate and injects up-to-date content into the root group.
      Parameters:
      list - the islands property

    • getEllipseRadius

      private Tuple<Double,Double> getEllipseRadius(double deg)
      Calculate the position for a point at the given angle (in degrees) on the ellipse,
      Parameters:
      deg - the angle (in degrees)
      Returns:
      a Tuple containing the position of the point (x-y)
